remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用委托来处理事件类型或组件发生更改时。The following sample demonstrates how to use a delegate to handle the event when a type or component changes. 在代码中，`OnRefreshed`事件处理事件，并显示被更改的组件。In the code, the `OnRefreshed` event handles the event and displays the component being changed. 代码假定`TextBox`控件已放置在窗体上。The code assumes that a `TextBox` control is already sited on the form.
